name: purple-nectar
effect: Changes Oricorio to Sensu Style. Single-use and cannot be used in battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
